A

addProcess(Process) - Method in interface domain.api.InterSchedulerInterface
Add a process to the `ShortTermScheduler`'s ready queue.
addProcess(Process) - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Used to add a process to the ready queue.
application - package application
 

B

blocked - Variable in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
 

C

ControlInterface - Interface in domain.api
Interface that allows the simulation to be controlled.

D

decrementBlockedTime() - Method in class domain.impl.Process
Decrements this process' blockedTime.
display(String) - Method in interface domain.api.NotificationInterface
Notify any information of interest related to the simulation to the UserInterface by the schedulers.
display(String) - Method in class domain.impl.UserInterface
Appends information to the output section of the window.
displayProcessQueues() - Method in interface domain.api.ControlInterface
Displays the current state of all queues.
displayProcessQueues() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Displays the names of the processes in all the queues.
displaySubmissionQueue() - Method in interface domain.api.SubmissionInterface
Shows the processes waiting to get to the ready queue.
displaySubmissionQueue() - Method in class domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
Displays all the processes that are in the submission queue of this scheduler waiting to be submitted to the ShortTermScheduler.
domain.api - package domain.api
 
domain.impl - package domain.impl
 

E

execute() - Method in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
Executes a line of code through a quantum of time.
execute() - Method in class domain.impl.RoundRobin
Gets the first process in the ready queue and simulates the execution of one instruction of the process, displaying the process beign executed, passing the time of a quantum, and then adding it in the ready, blocked or finished queue, depending on the instruction read.
execute() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortestJobFirst
Each time this method is called, it either removes a process from the ready queue, or continues the execution of the currently executing process.

finished - Variable in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy

Getter for this process' `blockedFor` property.
getBlockFor() - Method in class domain.impl.ProgramLine
Get the amount of quanta that this ProgramLine will block the program for.
getName() - Method in class domain.impl.Process
Getter for this process' `name` property.
getNextLine() - Method in class domain.impl.Process
Returns the next line that will be executed.
getProcessLoad() - Method in interface domain.api.InterSchedulerInterface
Returns the current load of the `ShortTermScheduler`.
getProcessLoad() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Returns the total number of processes currently managed by this scheduler.

Getter for this process' `timeEstimate` property.
getTimeEstimate() - Method in class domain.impl.ProgramLine
Get the time estimate for this ProgramLine.

H

hasNextLine() - Method in class domain.impl.Process
Returns `true` if there are more lines to execute, `false` otherwise.

I

InterSchedulerInterface - Interface in domain.api
Allows for communication between schedulers.
isExecutingProcess() - Method in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
Whether or not a process is currently executing.
isExecutingProcess() - Method in class domain.impl.RoundRobin
Wheter this strategy is executing an process or not.
isExecutingProcess() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortestJobFirst
Returns `true` if there is a process currently executing, `false` otherwise.

L

LongTermScheduler - Class in domain.impl
This class is responsible for getting a path to a file and creating a `Process` instance with its contents, then submitting this new object to the `ShortTermScheduler` via an instance of `NotificationInterface`.
LongTermScheduler(int) - Constructor for class domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
Constructor for LongTermScheduler, accepts the max `ShortTermScheduler` load as argument, to balance the system's load.

N

NotificationInterface - Interface in domain.api
Interface used to display notifications to the user.
notificationInterface - Variable in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
 

P

passQuantum() - Method in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
Method to simulate the passing of a quantum of time.
Process - Class in domain.impl
Class that represents a process that will be executed by the simulation.
Process(String) - Constructor for class domain.impl.Process
Constructor that takes a file path as a parameter to create an instance of class `Process`.
ProgramLine - Class in domain.impl
Class that represents a line of code in a program.
ProgramLine(String) - Constructor for class domain.impl.ProgramLine
Constructs an instance of ProgramLine from a String line by parsing it and setting the blockFor and timeEstimate properties that will be used to simulate the execution of a process.

Q

quantumSizeMs - Variable in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
 

R

ready - Variable in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
 
resumeSimulation() - Method in interface domain.api.ControlInterface
Resumes a suspended simulation.
resumeSimulation() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Resumes the simulation and notify the user of the event.
RoundRobin - Class in domain.impl
This scheduling strategy uses ArrayDeque for its ready queue, so that whenever it executes a process, it removes it from the front of ready queue, executes it for a quantum of time, then puts it at the end of the ready or blocked queue, according to the last instruction.
RoundRobin() - Constructor for class domain.impl.RoundRobin
Instantiates a new `RoundRobin` that extends `SchedulingStrategy` with ready and blocked queues as new `ArrayDeque`s.
run() - Method in class domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
When the `Thread` is started, this method will continuously check if there are processes to be submitted, and submit them if the `ShortTermScheduler`'s load is below some limit.
run() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
When the `Thread` is started, this method will run an infinite loop, executing the `schedulingStrategy` until the simulation is stopped.

S

SchedulerSimulator - Class in application
This class is responsible for creating all objects necessary for a simulation, with the correct parameters, and creating the relationships between them.
SchedulerSimulator(int, int, SchedulingStrategy) - Constructor for class application.SchedulerSimulator
This method is responsible for creating an instance of the simulator, given quantum size, max load and strategy.
SchedulingStrategy - Class in domain.api
Abstract class to declare methods that all Strategies must have, and reuse common code.
SchedulingStrategy() - Constructor for class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
 
setBlockedFor(int) - Method in class domain.impl.Process
Setter for this process' `blockedFor` property.
setControlInterface(ControlInterface) - Method in class domain.impl.UserInterface
Sets the controlInterface instance to be used.
setInterSchedulerInterface(InterSchedulerInterface) - Method in class domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
Setter for `IntrSchedulerInterface` instance.
setNotificationInterface(NotificationInterface) - Method in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
Setter for `notificationInterface`.
setNotificationInterface(NotificationInterface) - Method in class domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
Setter for `NotificationInterface` instance.
setNotificationInterface(NotificationInterface) - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Setter for the `notificationInterface`.
setQuantumSizeMs(int) - Method in class domain.api.SchedulingStrategy
Setter for the quantum size
setSubmissionInterface(SubmissionInterface) - Method in class domain.impl.UserInterface
Sets the submissionInterface instance to be used.
ShortestJobFirst - Class in domain.impl
This scheduling algorithm uses PriorityQueue for its ready queue, ordered by time estimates, so that when it executes a process, it removes it from the front of the queue, and executes it until the process either finishes or is blocked.
ShortestJobFirst() - Constructor for class domain.impl.ShortestJobFirst
Intantiates a new `ShortestJobFirst` with `PriorityQueue` as ready queue.
ShortTermScheduler - Class in domain.impl
This class is responsible for executing a scheduling strategy in a given list of processes that it receives by implementing the `InterSchedulerInterface`.
ShortTermScheduler(SchedulingStrategy, int) - Constructor for class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Constructor that receives a quantum size in milliseconds and a scheduling strategy so that the simulation can be executed with given params.
startSimulation() - Method in interface domain.api.ControlInterface
Starts the simulation.
startSimulation() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Starts the simulation, calling the `start()` method of this thread if it wasn't alive and notify the user of the event.
stopSimulation() - Method in interface domain.api.ControlInterface
Completely stops the simulation.
stopSimulation() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Stops the simulation, clearing all the queues and notify the user of the event.
SubmissionInterface - Interface in domain.api
Interface used to standardize submissions of new processes.
submitJob(String) - Method in interface domain.api.SubmissionInterface
Submits a new process by path.
submitJob(String) - Method in class domain.impl.LongTermScheduler
Method used to create a `Process` instance from a file path, then submitting it to the `ShortTermScheduler` via an instance of `NotificationInterface`.
suspendSimulation() - Method in interface domain.api.ControlInterface
Suspends (pauses) the simulation.
suspendSimulation() - Method in class domain.impl.ShortTermScheduler
Pauses the simulation and notify the user of the event.

T

toString() - Method in class domain.impl.Process
Returns a string representation of this process.
toString() - Method in class domain.impl.ProgramLine
Returns the original contents of the program's line.

U

UserInterface - Class in domain.impl
This class is the thread responsible for all the interactions with the user.
